content.text: 检查值是否为有限数字（排除NaN和Infinity）。Checks if a value is a finite number (excludes NaN and Infinity)
如果值为有限数字则返回true，否则返回false。True if the value is a finite number, false otherwise

```ts
// Valid numbers
isNumber(1); // -> true
isNumber(0); // -> true
isNumber(-42); // -> true
isNumber(3.14); // -> true
isNumber(Number(1)); // -> true
```

```ts
// Invalid numbers
isNumber(NaN); // -> false
isNumber(Infinity); // -> false
isNumber(-Infinity); // -> false
isNumber(new Number(1)); // -> false (Number object)
```

```ts
// Non-numbers
isNumber('123'); // -> false (string)
isNumber(null); // -> false
isNumber(undefined); // -> false
isNumber(true); // -> false
```

```ts
// Edge cases
isNumber(0 / 0); // -> false (NaN)
isNumber(1 / 0); // -> false (Infinity)
isNumber(-0); // -> true (negative zero is a valid number)
```

text.comment:
Function:

isNumber

Description:

检查值是否为有限数字（排除NaN和Infinity）。Checks if a value is a finite number (excludes NaN and Infinity)

Returns:

如果值为有限数字则返回true，否则返回false。True if the value is a finite number, false otherwise

Example:
// Valid numbers
isNumber(1); // -> true
isNumber(0); // -> true
isNumber(-42); // -> true
isNumber(3.14); // -> true
isNumber(Number(1)); // -> true
Example:
// Invalid numbers
isNumber(NaN); // -> false
isNumber(Infinity); // -> false
isNumber(-Infinity); // -> false
isNumber(new Number(1)); // -> false (Number object)
Example:
// Non-numbers
isNumber('123'); // -> false (string)
isNumber(null); // -> false
isNumber(undefined); // -> false
isNumber(true); // -> false
Example:
// Edge cases
isNumber(0 / 0); // -> false (NaN)
isNumber(1 / 0); // -> false (Infinity)
isNumber(-0); // -> true (negative zero is a valid number)
